mapper.sql: SELECT * , @RN TOT_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.* , (@RN := @RN + 1) AS RNUM FROM (
mapper.select:
SELECT A.USER_ID ,A.USER_NM ,A.USER_PW ,A.USE_YN ,A.REG_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DTTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS REG_DTTM ,A.MOD_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.MOD_DTTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS MOD_DTTM ,B.AUTH_GRP_ID ,C.AUTH_GRP_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(D.LOGIN_DTTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS LOGIN_DTTM ,D.REMOTE_IP FROM TB_SYS_USER A LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_AUTH_GRP C ON B.AUTH_GRP_ID = C.AUTH_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.LOGIN_DTTM, T2.REMOTE_IP, T1.USER_ID FROM( SELECT MAX(LOGIN_DTTM) AS LOGIN_DTTM, USER_ID FROM TB_SYS_LOGIN_HIST GROUP BY USER_ID )T1 INNER JOIN TB_SYS_LOGIN_HIST T2 ON T1.USER_ID=T2.USER_ID AND T1.LOGIN_DTTM=T2.LOGIN_DTTM ) D ON A.USER_ID = D.USER_ID
B.AUTH_GRP_ID IN ( SELECT CD_ID FROM TB_SYS_CD_INFO WHERE CD_GRP_ID = 'SP001' )
AND A.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SE_ID_USER}, '%')
AND A.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SE_NM_USER}, '%')
AND B.AUTH_GRP_ID = #{SE_ID_GROUP}
ORDER BY A.USER_ID ASC

SELECT A.USER_ID ,A.USER_NM ,A.USER_PW ,A.USE_YN ,A.REG_ID ,A.EMAIL ,A.USER_TP ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DTTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS REG_DTTM ,A.MOD_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.MOD_DTTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS MOD_DTTM ,B.AUTH_GRP_ID ,C.AUTH_GRP_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(D.LOGIN_DTTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS LOGIN_DTTM ,D.REMOTE_IP FROM TB_SYS_USER A LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_AUTH_GRP C ON B.AUTH_GRP_ID = C.AUTH_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.LOGIN_DTTM, T2.REMOTE_IP, T1.USER_ID FROM( SELECT MAX(LOGIN_DTTM) AS LOGIN_DTTM, USER_ID FROM TB_SYS_LOGIN_HIST GROUP BY USER_ID )T1 INNER JOIN TB_SYS_LOGIN_HIST T2 ON T1.USER_ID=T2.USER_ID AND T1.LOGIN_DTTM=T2.LOGIN_DTTM ) D ON A.USER_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE B.AUTH_GRP_ID IN ( SELECT CD_ID FROM TB_SYS_CD_INFO WHERE CD_GRP_ID = 'SP001' ) AND A.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} LIMIT 0,1
